title: [K-12] Foundational Mathematics Learning Design from a Human Resource Development Perspective in the Democratic Kampuchea Era

context.additional_context: Analysis of informal learning systems that emerged under forced labor systems through historical cases, reinterpreted from a modern HRD perspective

learning_goals: Learners can analyze human resource development cases during the Democratic Kampuchea period to explain learning mechanisms in forced labor environments
Learners can apply mathematical problem-solving skills through project-based assessment tasks designed from an HRD perspective
Learners can propose methods for integrating HRD approaches into modern instructional design based on historical case studies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
